projects.title: Monthly Mix
projects.description: Design and development for a personal project that showcases the newest music from each month. Listeners can subscribe to monthly newsletters and listen on the website

projects.title: Go Set A Watchman Extract
projects.description: Art direction, design and development for an exclusive extract of Harper Lee’s new novel.

projects.title: BBC Archive
projects.description: The BBC Archive is an interactive television channel. Designed to allow users to discover new content as well as indulging in nostalgia from the BBC’s rich history
